author: Gary Larson

entries.title: The Far Side comic 1 for March 21, 2024

summary.caption:
“We've done it! They've linked up! … Man,
 Feldman must be freaking out—he even hates
spiders.”

entries.title: The Far Side comic 2 for March 21, 2024

summary.caption: “Oh, wow! How could you even think that, Wendy? Of course it’s your mind I’m attracted to!”

entries.title: The Far Side comic 3 for March 21, 2024

summary.caption: Expatriates, they migrated in the 1920s to Paris’s Left Bank, gathering in their favorite haunts and discussing the meaning of cream pies and big shoes. They were, in fact, the original Boclownians.

entries.title: The Far Side comic 4 for March 21, 2024

summary.caption: “Whoa! Listen to that, Marge! ... I said that kid was playing a mean sax!”

entries.title: The Far Side comic 5 for March 21, 2024

summary.caption: “Hey, Bob! So how’s death been treating you?”
